segments.text: The kitchen has upper cabinets open on one side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A jar full of cookies sits inside, tempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool carefully, I think.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It tilts, and he might tumble down hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's watching, but if it falls, she'll be scared too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink runs freely, unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate, foot wet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Slippery floor could cause anyone to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow might damage the wood cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden path looks safe, but inside it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the boy will drop the plate and shatter it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a big accident quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids seem unaware of how dangerous it is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hoping no one gets hurt in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene builds tension for me.
segments.speaker: PAR
